parameters: I appear to be in a strange place.
We haven't spoken for a fair bit.
It appears to be a dream, but...
Still, what a strange place this is.
I don't think it's dangerous, atleast.
Let's use it effectively as a place
where only we can talk calmly.
So you came to see me.
I can't talk to you much, so...
I want to communicate with you.
Why don't we talk often, then?
I'd love to interact outside, too.
Why don't we talk often, then?
I'd love to interact outside, too.
But what I can't do, I can't...
We can only talk when we're in Ainoa.
Anywhere else, I can't even sense you──
does that mean you can see what I'm doing, \N[10]?
I can even hear your voice.
I can even hear your voice.
...I'm a little embarrassed. I may have let my guard
down because I thought I wasn't being seen.
But at the same time, I'm relieved.
That I'm being watched over by you.
I believe you've known already, but I've
reunited with that monster back in Talvirar.
She's in despair── so she said.
I don't know anything about the details,
but if she's really in despair, I think...
Why I think so, I don't know myself.
I just want you to keep this in mind.
Well then. Let's ask Tahati about
If it's in Ordwald, then I...
Is what Tyvar said all true?
I talked about Kaamos's past, that I witnessed.
...Given the circumstances, that is reasonable indeed.
And moreover, Miss Tahati predicted the world's
...I have no special feelings about Ordwald.
As you can tell, I've no problem at all
becoming this world's Lord of Reason.
Even if that world's destruction was inevitable,
I felt the need to fight it with my very existence...
...I feel like my existence is for this purpose.
I can't help but feel that way.
Surely, I am not fit to be Lord of Reason.
Do you want to touch me...?
Would you like to view the scene [Behind the Stars]?
